title: Keto Tortilla Chips
directions: First, melt mozzarella cheese in the microwave for about 30 seconds. Stir and microwave for 30 more seconds.
Next, add the almond flour and about 1 tsp of sea salt. Combine well, you should end up with a ball of dough
place the ball of dough on a large piece of parchment paper. You will also need a piece of parchment paper to go on top of the dough.
Using a rolling pin, roll the dough out between the 2 pieces of parchment paper. Don’t be afraid to roll it out thin. The thinner the dough is, the crunchier your chips will be.
Using a pizza cutter or a knife, cut the dough into squares or triangles. Place chips onto the prepared baking sheet. If desired, salt again before baking.
ingredients: ¼ cup almond flour or almond meal
